amendatorysection.catchline: Workforce Development Program Cash Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Workforce Development Program Cash Fund is hereby created. The fund shall consist of transfers authorized by the Legislature. The Department of Labor shall administer the fund to provide workforce development grants. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
